citations.narrative:
On May 19, 2024, a guest was observed accidentally stepping on a budgie in the aviary. The bird died and necropsy
showed signs consistent with trauma. The aviary is a walk-through exhibit with an attendant that allows feeding of seed
sticks to the birds by guests.
Failure to ensure careful handling can result in trauma and/or death to the birds in the exhibit.
Handling of all animals must be done as carefully as possible in a manner that does not cause trauma or physical harm.
Correct by: July 8, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives..
n

narrative:
2.131(b)(1)  Critical
   
Handling of animals. 
On May 19, 2024, a guest was observed accidentally stepping on a budgie in the aviary. The bird died and necropsy 
showed signs consistent with trauma. The aviary is a walk-through exhibit with an attendant that allows feeding of seed 
sticks to the birds by guests. 
Failure to ensure careful handling can result in trauma and/or death to the birds in the exhibit. 
Handling of all animals must be done as carefully as possible in a manner that does not cause trauma or physical harm. 
Correct by: July 8, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.. 
 
 n
